title: Gillian Tett: Anthro-Vision: A New Way to See in Business and Life
itunes:title: Gillian Tett: Anthro-Vision: A New Way to See in Business and Life
description: Financial Times columnist and US editorial board chair Gillian Tett talks about her new book, Anthro-Vision, which makes the case for how anthropological intelligence can help us make better sense of the contemporary world.
